resources.string: The global search engine for missing persons
With the support of the french Ministry of Economy, Finances and Industry
Synchronize the information collected on your mobile with the web site of MISSING.NET.

The Red Helmets Foundation, in partnership with Bearstech and European Consulting Services, created MISSING.NET, the global search engine for missing persons. 
 
On MISSING.NET, the users can :
 
- Create a missing person profile 
- Search for a missing person 
- Access to a missing people facebook. 
- Bring a testimony 
- Geolocalize the victims 
- Incorporate feeds concerning the disappearance. 
- Declare of a found person 
 
To allow the humanitarian actors to collect useful information, in emergency, a mobile application was developed under Android. 
The application allows to add missing or found persons to the database while being offline and later on to synchronise with the website. 
 
This project was realized with the cooperation of Google and the support of the French Ministry of Economy, Finances and Industry.
